headline.main: TIRPITZ IS REPORTED MAKING FOR ARCTIC; Battleship Quits Trondheim -- Repairs Hamper British Yards

abstract: London source repts Ger battleship Tirpitz in northern Norwegian port to join attacks on Allied convoys to USSR; convoy repairs in Brit described
